title: Fragmentary imperial dedication
support: Two fragments of a stone altar, but no details preserved.

layout.p: It is unclear exactly what the relationship of the two fragments to one another was.

date._: Post-4 CE, date of Tiberius' adoption

provenanceFound._: Observed by Gualtherus (1624) inside the town-hall of Termini, broken and one of the two parts already missing. Not seen since.
